about.p1: My journey started with taking things apart, and now I put them together—turning complex problems into clean, scalable full-stack solutions powered by AI.
about.p2: I thrive at the intersection of solid engineering and artificial intelligence. When I'm not building end-to-end systems, I'm integrating AI tools into development workflows and mentoring teams to be more productive. It's a team sport, and I love playing.

ide.comment:
// I build end-to-end systems enhanced by AI,
    // bridging design and high-performance engineering.

exp1.title: Full-Stack AI Engineer,
exp1.desc: Operate with full autonomy as a Full-Stack AI Engineer, delivering complete end-to-end systems. Built an enterprise administrative management platform solo—29 backend modules, 225 endpoints, multi-currency budgetary logic with approval flows, and a full frontend—in 8 business days. Championed AI tool integration (including Claude Code) across the team, boosting developer productivity. Independently manage reporting solutions with Fast Reports and mentor interns and junior developers.

exp2.title: Software Developer,
exp2.desc: Served as a key collaborator on a unified design system, mentored junior developers, and optimized application data layers to deliver a faster, more responsive user experience.

projects.featured_description: This project showcases advanced development skills and best practices.

contact.subtitle: Have a project, or just want to connect? My inbox is open.
